title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.31 - Advertising, promotion, education and publicity of dairy products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.31 - Advertising, promotion, education and publicity of dairy products

State Regulations

The commissioner, with the advice and assistance of the
advisory board, is hereby authorized to contract with any person or persons to
carry on or cause to be carried on such advertising, promotion, education and
publicity programs as he may believe will create new markets for the milk of
producers as defined in this Part or maintain present markets therefor. For
such purposes, he may expend such monies or any part thereof as may be
available pursuant to this Part. No advertising, promotion or publicity
programs shall be conducted pursuant to this Part which make reference to any
particular brand or trade name. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
